statement.p: In 44.44 of the last 45 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{45}}={0.4444}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{45}. \displaystyle{P}={0.4444}\cdot{45}={19.998}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 45-19.998=25.002 We round that as requested to 25.
